alert.note: Alert for Benton; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:02PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Benton and northeastern Washington Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 601 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles west of Bentonville to 6 miles southeast of Springdale. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Bella Vista... Lowell... Tontitown... Cave Springs... Highfill... Northwest Arkansas Regional Air... Centerton... Johnson... Elm Springs... Goshen... Mayfield... Vaughn... Monte Ne... Healing Springs... Sonora... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 67 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
